title: Printing of School Text Books distributed free-of-charge for  the year  2014
decision_details: the proposal made by Hon. Bandula Gunawardena, Minister of Education, to entrust the printing of 8,546,100 copies of 81 categories of books at a cost of Rs.758,385,350.00 to the State Printing Corporation, and 1,030,000 copies of 05 categories of books at a cost of Rs.63,980,520.00 to the Government Printing Department, pertaining to the School Text Books to be distributed in the year 2014, was approved by the Cabinet.
